mapper.select: SELECT t.*, r.* FROM PHO_HT_ORDER_ROOMTYPE t, PHO_HT_ORDER r WHERE t.orderid = r.orderid AND r.mcid = #{MCID} ORDER BY r.dtorderdate DESC

SELECT CNAME, CROOMTYPEID, MPRICE, CASE WHEN min(icount) >= 1 THEN '1' ELSE '2' END FROM PHO_HT_ROOMTYPE WHERE mcid = #{MCID} AND cstrdate BETWEEN #{STARTDATE} AND #{ENDDATE} GROUP BY cname, croomtypeid, mprice
